============================================
core/alias/concat_lhs
============================================

module byte_swap (inout wire [31:0] A, inout wire [31:0] B);
    alias {A[7:0],A[15:8],A[23:16],A[31:24]} = B;
endmodule

----

(source_file
  (module_declaration
    (module_ansi_header
      (module_keyword)
      name: (simple_identifier)
